title: Summer Is the Best - A Conversation With Colin
description:
Remember summer camp? Greg and Colin don't.

Today's topics were submitted by @ALEXFLANNAGAN. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/ BUY T-SHIRTS: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Follow us on Twitter
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/notaxation

#AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

Huge thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

transcript_chunks.text: it's difficult sometimes to work over the summer not San Francisco cuz the summer sucks here what's up everybody Welcome to A Conversation With Colin I'm Greg and this is my roommate Colin now sometimes Colin says crazy stuff so every Tuesday and Thursday I reach into my random topic pile pull one out toss it at him and we talk it out for your amusement if you like that like the video share it with your friends and subscribe to us here on YouTube Colin are you ready guess today's topic is did you go to summer camp and how was your experience it was submitted by Alex Flanigan on Twitter did you ever go to summer camp no so what did you do during the summer hung out yeah yeah you're well did you have a f I didn't I didn't go to I didn't go to a like sleep away summer camp either but I did go to like a day camp summer camp thing right where it was like run through the Glenland parks and WCK department or whatever and you go there and like you draw and make crafts and crap like that and
